Question
========

From a vase containing 1000 marbles of which 80% are red and 20% are blue, a sample of five marbles is randomly drawn a sample of five marbles. How large is the probability that that sample will contain exactly 3 red marbles?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.02
* 0.20
* 0.51

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.02: Incorrect
* 0.20: Correct
* 0.51: Incorrect
